title: Welcome!
author: Dan
body: Hello and welcome to Grace's Wings, a Supernatural/Urban Fantasy webcomic by Faith Schindler (Story/Art) and Dan Michalak (Story/Scripts/Website). We've launched with the full first chapter, ready to read, though beyond that we'll update once a week on Wednesdays. I've set up the site to be able to host multiple comics, as we have some ideas for spin-offs and miniseries, and we have some friends with ideas for comics. However, those won't be coming for a while, and even then Grace's Wings will remain our flagship series. You can start reading through from the Archive button at top. We have a cast page that will be updated as the series goes on. Any questions? Feel free to contact us at the places on the Contact page. Enjoy!

title: Grace's Wings Chapter 2
author: Dan
body: Chapter 2 is out! Starting this week, we'll now be updating twice a week: Monday and Wednesday. I also did a bit of tinkering with the site. The main page is now the most recent page instead of the news page.
